solution_line_template: Both cakes use {egg_whites_per_cake} egg whites so she would typically use {num_cakes}*{egg_whites_per_cake} = <<{num_cakes}*{egg_whites_per_cake}={total_egg_whites}>>{total_egg_whites} egg whites

{aquafaba_per_egg_white} tablespoons of aquafaba is equivalent to 1 egg white and she needs {total_egg_whites} egg whites to that's {aquafaba_per_egg_white}*{total_egg_whites} = <<{aquafaba_per_egg_white}*{total_egg_whites}={total_aquafaba_needed}>>{total_aquafaba_needed} tablespoons of aquafaba
